TIME Lab

Tree Ring Innovations in Mass Spectrometry for Earth Systems

The TIME Lab at the University of Arizona is a new innovative facility combining the latest high-resolution radiocarbon and stable isotope analysis. The facility is currently in a phase of testing and development with the aim of a full launch in the fall of 2025. In addition to cutting edge research the lab will also provide a variety of analytical services to both University of Arizona and external researchers.
